name: SOFTEL Communications
description:
Unified Communications and Contact Centers, with special emphasis on multi-vendor, multi-platform environments.
SOFTEL Communications helps customers world-wide make money! We focus on integrating technology tools to enable your business to be more profitable, generate more sales, be more agile and competitive, provide superior customer experiences, create a more productive workforce, and control expenses. And above all we do it with special attention to your specific needs.
Customers within our own industry such as AT&T, Bell Canada, British Telecom, Verizon, Microsoft, and Cisco trust our expertise and ability to successfully work in multi-platform, multi-vendor environments. Long-term relationships with such diverse customers as SunLife Insurance, Emblem Health, Hydro-Quebec, State of Texas and internationally DELL Inc, JP MorganChase as well as many others are a testament to our focus on their specific business needs and our ability to provide and integrate the technology tools that address those needs.
The IT world in every organization today includes multiple vendors, multiple platforms, and many applications. Who has the expertise to make everything work together? Softel does. We do it every day for our customers! We have over 20 years of experience and practice – we know how to do it because we’ve done it for a multitude of satisfied customers across the globe.
